title: [Discussion] Commencing date?
content: Help me know about the opening date for students admitted through kcet 2nd round in pesu rr campus

comments.body: It will be informed to you by email; Don't stress about it; Most probably it will be Monday(8th sept)
Your question or post has been answered previously. Before making a new post, always remember to search the subreddit. Duplicate posts will entail deletion.
